name: Shift Race: car racing 3D game
description:
Helicopter, car, or motorboat - choose the required vehicle during the race to come first!

Collect and double coins!

Race against opponents, achieve levels , unlock new characters.  Every level brings a new unique fun experience.  Very easy to play.

Simple gameplay with efficient and easy to learn controls.

Terms of use: https://bit.games/en/terms_of_service
